summary: A student becomes a recluse in response to her best friend's suicide and locks herself in her room. She believes that someone is in the room with her. Her alarmed family hires a psychologist to intervene.
cast: Min-seo Chae|Yeong-suk Jeong|Yu-seok Jeong|Eun-ah Ko|Da-In Lee|Hye-won Seo|Min-jeong Song
title: Woetoli
